response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and functionality that promises to exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value surpasses $1,000,000. Considering its immense worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for the finest offerings. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
